## Facet interface

Metadata describing a facet of the chart which represents some dimension of the data.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface Facet 
```

## Properties

<table><thead><tr><th>

Property


</th><th>

Modifiers


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[datatype](./paramanifest.facet.datatype.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

"number" \| "date" \| "string"


</td><td>

The primitive type of the data measured by this facet.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[denominator?](./paramanifest.facet.denominator.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ If the units for this facet of the chart are fractional, then this is the denominator of that fraction. For example: '(per) capita', '(per) million inhabitants'. If this property is present, then every series on the chart must measure a fractional quantity, of which this will also be the denominator.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[description?](./paramanifest.facet.description.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ An extended text description for the quantity measured by this facet.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[displayType](./paramanifest.facet.displaytype.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

[DisplayType](./paramanifest.displaytype.md)


</td><td>


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[label](./paramanifest.facet.label.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

A text label for the quantity measured by this facet.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[measure](./paramanifest.facet.measure.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

"nominal" \| "ordinal" \| "interval" \| "ratio"


</td><td>

The NOIR data scale of the quantity this facet measures.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[multiplier?](./paramanifest.facet.multiplier.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The number each datum of this facet must be multiplied by to get the true value. Defaults to 1.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[units?](./paramanifest.facet.units.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The units for the data of this facet, in singular form, if any. This value should be absent if the facet measures a dimensionless quantity. If the units for this facet of the chart are fractional, then this is only the numerator of that fraction.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[variableType](./paramanifest.facet.variabletype.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

"dependent" \| "independent"


</td><td>

Whether the variable this facet measures depends on the variable measured by another facet or facets.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
